title: Why is the Prevent counter-terrorism programme review so controversial?
description: The UK scheme has long had its critics, but now even the review looking at how to overhaul it is facing criticism. Why is the debate around Prevent so heated?. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: Why is the Prevent counter-terrorism programme review so controversial?
